alert.note: Alert for Dunn; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dunn and southeastern St. Croix Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Knapp, or 9 miles west of Menomonie, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Menomonie around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Elk Mound. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 27 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Wisconsin.
